From: "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@...>

{Xiane}

    Xiane nodded, "Aye it shalt be mine honor to help repair the Ark, I
shalt get to work on yonder computers and try to get the seilding back to
that it shouldst be. Walls and autocannons be fine, but hark it shalt be nay
but near impossible to harm yonder great ship if its sheilding is working as
it shouldst!"

    With that Xiane headed for the main hatch to leave the ship. His pods
mechanics should be able to replace some of the wiring of the arks great
computers....
